name: Google Keep - Easy Arabic
description:
If you don't use Arabic PLEASE DO NOT install this style, it is useless for you !    
For Google Keep - Arabic users,  just try it !!
additional_info:
1- This style may conflict with other Google Keep styles, so before you rush and delete it, try to disable other styles while you are testing this one, then choose what suits your needs.
 
2- If suddenly things got ugly (because of Google updates of "Keep" original style), just give me 24 hours at max, I'll fix it, because I use it on a daily basis and will notice any error happened.
